T2: Judgment Day – Metal T-1000 (Men)

T2: Judgment Day – Metal T-1000 (Male)
kDesc

With the T-1000 being an advanced prototype made of a mimetic poly-alloy it could morph into the shape of certain objects it comes in contact with. This is a full body outfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Le T-1000 étant un prototype avancé constitué de poly-alliage mimétique, il peut se métamorphoser en objets avec lesquels il entre en contact. Il s'agit d'un costume intégral. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Der T-1000 ist ein weiterentwickelter Prototyp aus einer mimetischen Polylegierung, die es ihm ermöglicht, die Gestalt bestimmter Objekte anzunehmen, mit denen er in Berührung kommt. Dies ist ein Ganzkörperoutfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Il T-1000 è un prototipo avanzato fatto di una lega polimetallico-mimetica, che gli consente di assumere la forma di certi oggetti con cui entra a contatto. Si tratta di un completo. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

El T-1000 es un prototipo avanzado, fabricado con polialeación mimética, de manera que puede mutarse y adoptar la forma de ciertos objetos con los que entra en contacto. Es un atuendo de cuerpo entero. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

最新型ターミネーターとして誕生したT-1000。その液体金属で作られた体は接触した物質に姿を変えます。\n\nTerminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

형태모방 다중합금으로 만들어진 고급 시제품 T-1000은 접촉하는 물체의 형태로 변환할 수 있습니다. 이 아이템은 전신 복장입니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

With the T-1000 being an advanced prototype made of a mimetic poly-alloy it could morph into the shape of certain objects it comes in contact with. This is a full body outfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

隨著T-1000成為由模仿能力的技術合金組成的高級原型，它能夠變成所接觸的任何物體的形狀。這是全身套裝。Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
